title: Horsey Beef Pretzel Bites
directions: Arrange Pretzel Crisps onto a large tray. Top with roast beef and a piece of mozzarella cheese. Add a slice or 2 of red onion. Put a dollop (about 1/4 teaspoon) of horseradish on the onion. Garnish with chives.
ingredients: 8 ounces thinly sliced deli roast beef, cut or torn into bite-size pieces
8 ounces sliced smoked mozzarella cheese, cut into 24 pieces
Â¼ cup thinly sliced red onion
